tag_professor: Caring (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)
comments: There is only 1 project you do for this class. That is just to choose a student resource location that students should use and talk about it. Easy A. There are only a few homework assignments and they are all easy A.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)
comments: The only way to fail this class is just not going and not doing anything . Everything is simple

tag_professor: Caring (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)
comments: Very helpful and you will find your major if you take the assessments and don\'t miss class it\'s an easy A. Speakers, field trips, and assignments that help you look outside the box at new ideas for a job. Kind teacher who wants you to find your major and she\'s easy going.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)
comments: Very helpful, and wants her students to know what they want to do after they take her class.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)
comments: Very helpful and made sure we knew what to take for our major classes. Pretty easy going but don\'t miss toomuch. really made us think about the best major for our own personalities.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)
comments: I didn\'t know what to major in and this class really helped me out. Teacher was friendly and cared but you need to do the work to learn.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)
comments: This teacher can be pretty boring. A career is something anybody will find on their own out of all the people that took this class didn\'t stick to that planned major. Overall this class is useless.
